effects: Cast Death (30%) or deal physical damage (2.4x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce ATK by 45% for 3 turns to one enemy
Inflict 2 random status effects (Petrify 30%, Paralyze 25% and Silence 20%) to one enemy
name: Death Cleave
Death Cleave
死之壞刃
죽음의 칼날
Fente mortelle
Todesschmetter
Hendidura mortal
desc_short: Instantly KO or damage, reduce ATK, and randomly silence, paralyze or petrify one enemy
對1名敵人施加致死一擊效果或傷害+降低攻擊的數值+隨機施加沉默麻痺石化效果
적 1명에게 일정 확률로 피해 또는 즉사 부여+공격력 감소+무작위로 침묵, 마비, 석화 부여
Mets immédiatement KO ou inflige des dégâts, réduit l'ATT et inflige silence, paralysie ou pétrification au hasard à un ennemi
Chance, einen Gegner sofort auszuschalten oder seine ANG zu reduzieren + zuf. Stille, Lähmung oder Stein.
Daña o deja K.O. al instante, reduce el ATQ e inflige al azar sil, par o pie a un enemigo
